minAvailable.title: The minAvailable Schema
minAvailable.description: If the type is string, then the following pattern must be followed: ^([0-9]+%)?$

maxUnavailable.title: The maxUnavailable Schema
maxUnavailable.description: If the type is string, then the following pattern must be followed: ^([0-9]+%)?$

memory.title: The memory Schema
memory.description: The following pattern must be followed: ^(?:\d+(E|P|T|G|M|k|Ei|Pi|Ti|Gi|Mi|Ki)?)?$

cpu.title: The cpu Schema
cpu.description: The following pattern must be followed: ^(?:\d+\.?\d*m?)?$

ephemeral-storage.title: The ephemeral-storage Schema
ephemeral-storage.description: The following pattern must be followed: ^(?:\d+(E|P|T|G|M|k|Ei|Pi|Ti|Gi|Mi|Ki)?)?$
